Series I: Appetite for Life: The Biography of Julia Child
Noël Riley Fitch Julia Child Papers
Noël Riley Fitch Julia Child Papers

Subseries B: Research Correspondence consists of correspondence between Noël Riley Fitch and Julia Child's family, friends, colleagues, acquaintances, as well as Child herself and those influenced by her. It is arranged alphabetically according to the name of the correspondent or institution, except for correspondence between Julia Child and Noël Riley Fitch which has been retained together at the end of the subseries.
